bill.summary:
Curb Objectionable Redirection of Resources and Unconstitutional Payments to Trump Act or the CORRUPT Act
This bill establishes reporting requirements for federal agencies regarding funds spent at, or payments made to, (1) properties controlled by the Trump Organization; or (2) an organization or business controlled by or associated with the President, a relative of the President, the head of an executive department, or an employee of the Trump Organization.
